alert.note: Alert for Hart (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 10:49AM EST until January 03 at 10:39PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Woodbury affecting Butler and Warren Counties. Green River at Munfordville affecting Hart County. Green River at Rochester affecting Butler, Ohio and Muhlenberg Counties. .Ongoing heavy rainfall will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Munfordville. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to late Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Water enters city park under US 31W bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 33.9 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=lmk Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued as updates become available.
